Attributes.description: Microbial and chemical factors that underlie public health challenges in the food supply chain; prevalence and nature of organisms which cause foodborne diseases; approaches and technologies for improvement of food safety.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of MICB 201, MICB 202, CHEM 233, FNH 313.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:30, Building: Food,, Room: Nutrition
